title: Authorizes a municipal corporation with fewer than fifty employees to join a municipal cooperative health benefit plan
summary: Authorizes a municipal corporation with fewer than fifty employees to join a municipal cooperative health benefit plan.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          89

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. REILICH -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Insurance

       AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to the size of  municipal
         corporations  eligible  to participate in municipal cooperative health
         benefit plans

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Section  4704 of the insurance law is amended by adding a
    2  new subsection (d) to read as follows:
    3    (D) NOTWITHSTANDING THE  PROVISIONS  OF  SECTION  THREE  THOUSAND  TWO
    4  HUNDRED  THIRTY-ONE  OF  THIS CHAPTER, A MUNICIPAL CORPORATION WITH LESS
    5  THAN FIFTY EMPLOYEES SHALL BE ELIGIBLE TO  PARTICIPATE  IN  A  MUNICIPAL
    6  COOPERATIVE HEALTH BENEFIT PLAN.
    7    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04104-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to the size of municipal corporations eligible to participate in municipal cooperative health benefit plans
